Installation:
```bash
pip install shiny
```

Package dependencies:
- shiny

To run the app:
```bash
shiny run app.py
```

This creates a simple app that:
1. Shows radio buttons with colored text labels
2. Updates a text output showing the currently selected value
3. Uses a clean layout with columns
4. Demonstrates reactive updates between input and output
## Preview the app on [Shinylive](https://shinylive.io/py/app/#h=0&)
